message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $8500.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
I'm glad we're negotiating in good faith. I'd like to propose an offer of $8750 for the product.
I'm glad we're still negotiating, Bob! I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9250.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $8875 for the product.
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9500, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $9000 for the product.
I'm not willing to budge much more, Bob. I'll meet you at $9200, but that's my final offer.
Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose an offer of $9100 for the product.
